name: Winter Slaw With Lemon-And-Orange Dressing
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: high fiber, low calorie, low-fat, vegan, vegetarian, lemon, napa cabbage, olive oil, orange, red bell pepper, red pepper, scallion, winter
recipeIngredient: 1/8 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
1 cup thinly sliced red bell pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together all ingredients except cabbage and bell pepper. Toss cabbage and bell pepper together in a medium bowl. Toss with the dressing and serve.
